Handwritten Postcard from Honus Wagner to his future wife, Bess, asking her why he hadn’t heard from her since arriving in Hot Springs, Arkansas.  Signed “Jay.”   From the Honus Wagner Estate.  

$2500 PayPal obo.  [IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210925/33a72ffa719857b91525c634eabe316c.jpg[/IMG]
